rooms.name: Engineering Quad
rooms.description: You are on the Engineering Quad, outside the Grainger Library

rooms.name: GraingerEntry
rooms.description: You are in the south entry of the Grainger Library. You can see the elevator, the circulation desk, espresso royale, and hallways to the east and west.

rooms.name: EspressoRoyale
rooms.description: You are in the Espresso Royale.  There are lots of caffeine addicted U of I students.

rooms.name: GraingerWestHallway
rooms.description: You are in the west hallway. You can see Current Periodicals Section.

rooms.name: CurrentPeriodicalsSection
rooms.description: You are in Current Periodicals Section. There is a space for storing periodicals.

rooms.name: GraingerEastHallway
rooms.description: You are in the east hallway. You can see the Computer Area and the Staff Area.

rooms.name: ComputerArea
rooms.description: You are in the Computer Area. There are happy U of I students working on their task.

rooms.name: StaffArea
rooms.description: You are in the Staff Area. There are happy grainger library staffs moving the books.

rooms.name: IdeaLab
rooms.description: You are in Idea Lab of Grainger. You see rooms for the group project and multiple 3-D printers.
